title: Cryptography & Security
description: Deep dive into the cryptographic foundations of blockchain

questions.question: What's the main difference between symmetric and asymmetric cryptography?
options: Symmetric is faster, asymmetric is more secure
Symmetric uses one key for both encryption/decryption, asymmetric uses key pairs
questions.explanation: Symmetric cryptography uses the same key for encryption and decryption, while asymmetric uses a public-private key pair.

questions.question: In public-key cryptography, which key is used to verify digital signatures?
questions.explanation: The public key is used to verify signatures created with the corresponding private key.
